translations: n.忠诚，忠贞；忠于……的强烈情感

sentences.sentence: Their loyalty only went so far.
sentences.translation: 他们的忠诚只能到这个程度。

sentences.sentence: Can I count on your loyalty?
sentences.translation: 我能指望你对我忠诚吗？

sentences.sentence: Their trust was repaid with fierce loyalty.
sentences.translation: 他们的信任获得的回报是忠心耿耿。
